item.title: Resume
item.description: José Manuel Reyes Evry 91000, France Phone: +33 7 68 48 65 86 E-mail: josereyesch@gmail.com Summary I’m a cross-functional Software Engineer with 9+ years’ experience, passionate about cloud architectures and distributed systems. Work Experience Research and Development Engineer Telecom SudParis, Evry, France (Apr 2018 - present) Conducting research on data-plane verification for Software Defined Networking (SDN) architectures. Go Python MongoDB Docker Senior Software Engineer Smartmatic, Panama City, Panama (Nov 2016 - Mar 2018)

item.title: About
item.description: I’m a cross-functional Software Engineer, passionate about cloud architectures and distributed systems. I love learning new things, playing around with the latest tech, and figuring out how things work. There’s something about the process of solving problems that excites me. Currently I’m getting involved with microservices with Golang in Docker, and in general I keep learning about technologies. I strongly believe in Kaizen as philosophy of work and life, because for me there is always something to improve and hence learn from it.

item.title: How to Clean Up Used Space by Docker
item.description: Using Docker has become very handy to must of us when working with multiple environments. However, one problem that we noticed is the incredible disk usage of it. So in this post I will list useful commands that could help us solving the issue.

item.title: First post ever...well
item.description:
Memories

It’s very interesting (at least to me) that after being in this Digital World for more than 15 years, this is the first time I’m writing a “real post” well, actually here my first attempt beatnbyte.blogspot.com more than 6 years ago!.
